column4: Thank you! Why did the GPG error happened in the first place? Any pointers to documentation?
Did the ftpmaster change the gpg key?
its really just a connection issue that is doing it
I can hit reload in synaptic and get gpg errors every time..but I hardly ever get them with sudo apt-get update
you can try sudo apt-get update if you like...I guarantee that it will work better than synaptic ;)
as it should
the unreliability of it will lead to complacency (take me as an example)
what mirror you downloading from ?
no employees around that I know of...mostly community members
k
I type your name first
Let's see...
yep..its in red for me
its the nick at the front that tells xchat to change the lettering color
its a necessary thing in here when its busy :)
/msg will send me a pm that only I can see
you see that private message ?
got it
you registered your nick too?
that gives you access to the bot if you are registerd..he will talk to you in PM
try /msg ubotu gpgerr
np :)
